summary: This is a forwarded email from August 12, 2019, with the subject 'Psych Observation 7/8/19 6 pm until 7/10/19 at 9 am (1/M companion utilized)'. It appears to be a communication regarding a psychological observation period for Jeffrey Epstein while he was in custody, noting the use of a companion. The email was sent shortly after Epstein's arrest and before his death.

events.title: Psych Observation Period Begins
events.description: A psychological observation period for Jeffrey Epstein begins at 6 pm.

events.title: Psych Observation Period Ends
events.description: The psychological observation period for Jeffrey Epstein ends at 9 am.

events.title: Email Forwarding
events.description: An email regarding the psychological observation is forwarded.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated August 12, 2019, concerning a psychological observation of Jeffrey Epstein.
The observation period was from July 8, 2019, at 6 pm to July 10, 2019, at 9 am.
The subject line indicates '1/M companion utilized', suggesting a companion was used during the observation.
The email was sent after Epstein's arrest in July 2019 and before his death in August 2019.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, labeled EFTA00142879.
